data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix dahurica (Dahurican larch) from sample MAJAKILA-42

Exposition N, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Schiefer, Tree line 1100 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 30%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: LADA Betula nidd. Bestand,Hanenfuss, Film number: 1041A
